name: Dental Care Visits (% of adults)
description: Rate of visits to dentist or dental clinic for adults aged 18 and older in the previous year

name: Food Insecurity Rate
description: Estimated percentage of food insecure households, where food security is defined as having access, at all times, to enough food for an active, healthy life for all household members.

name: Preventative Care Visits (% of adults)
description: Rate of visits to doctor for routine checkup for adults aged 18 and older in the previous year

name: Supermarket access (% of pop.)
description: Share of tract population that are beyond 1/2 mile from supermarket

name: Fatal motor vehicle accidents (per 10,000 pop.)
description: Number of fatal motor vehicle accidents per 10,000 persons.

name: Property crime rate (per 10,000 pop.)
description: Property crime includes the offenses of burglary, larceny-theft, motor vehicle theft, and arson

name: Violent crime rate (per 10,000 pop.)
description: Violent crime is composed of four offenses: murder and nonnegligent manslaughter, forcible rape, robbery, and aggravated assault.

name: Eviction Rate (per 100 renter homes)
description: Number of evictions per 100 renter homes in each census tract

name: Housing cost burden (owners) (% of housing units)
description: Fraction of owned housing units with cost greater than 30% of household income

name: Housing cost burden (renters) (% of housing units)
description: Fraction of rented housing units with cost greater than 30% of household income

name: Unhoused persons (per 100,000 pop.)
description: Unhoused/homeless persons per 100,000 persons as measured by local continuum-of-care (CoC) point-in-time (PIT) counts.
source: US Department of Housing and Urban Development

name: Housing Overcrowding (% of households)
description: Percentage of households with more than one occupant per room.

name: Safe Drinking Water Act health-based violations
description: Three year average of Safe Drinking Water Act health-based violations in public drinking water systems, modeled to census tract level from source location data.

name: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act hazardous waste violations
description: Three year average of Resource Conservation and Recovery Act hazardous waste violations at monitored sites, modeled to census tract level from source location data.

name: Impervious Surfaces
description: Percent of surface areas that are impervious to water.

name: Population without high school education or equivalent (% of pop. ages 18-24)
description: Percent of population aged 18-24 without high school diploma or equivalent.

name: Population with less than 9th grade education (% of pop.)
description: Percentage of population with less than a 9th grade education.

name: Preschool Enrollment (% of 3 & 4 year olds)
description: Percentage of three and four year olds enrolled in school

name: Broadband Subscription (% of pop.)
description: Percentage of population with a broadband subscription.

name: Cellular Data Subscription (% of pop.)
description: Percentage of population with a cellular data subscription.

name: No Internet Access (% of pop.)
description: Percentage of population with out any access to the internet.

name: Percentage Forest Cover Decline from 2011 to 2016
description: Percentage decline in total forested area in 2016 compared to base year 2011.

name: Percentage of Land Area in High Risk Flood Zone
description: Percentage of total land area in FEMA-designated high-risk flood zones A, AE, V, or VE which all have at least a 1% annual chance of flooding and a 26% chance of flooding over the life of a 30-year mortgage.

name: Ozone average 8-hour concentration (ppm)
description: Average 8-hour ozone concentration in parts per million, modeled to census tract level from air quality monitoring station data.

name: PM2.5 average annual concentration (μg/m3)
description: Average annual particulate matter (2.5) in micrograms per cubic meter, modeled to census tract level from air quality monitoring station data.

name: Cancer Prevalence (% of adults)
description: Cancer (excluding skin cancer) prevalence among adults aged 18 and older.

name: Coronary Heart Disease Prevalence (% of adults)
description: Coronary heart disease prevalence among aduts aged 18 and older

name: Diabetes Prevalence (% of adults)
description: Percentage of adults aged 20 and above with diagnosed diabetes.

name: Drug Overdose Deaths (per 100,000 pop.)
description: Deaths attributable to drug and alcohol overdoses per 100,000 persons.
source: CDC National Center for Health Statistics

name: Poor Mental Health Days
description: The average number of days a tract’s adult respondents report that their mental health was not good, based on the survey question: “Thinking about your mental health, which includes stress, depression, and problems with emotions, for how many days during the past 30 days was your mental health not good?”.

name: Mental Health Facilities (per 100,000 pop.)
description: Presence of mental health or substance abuse facilities per 100,000 persons.
source: DHHS Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration

name: Obesity Prevalence (% of adults)
description: Percentage of adults that report a BMI of 30 or more.

name: Associates Degree Holders (% of pop. age 25+)
description: Percent of population 25 and older whose highest degree attained is an Associate's degree.

name: Bachelors Degree Holders (% of pop. age 25+)
description: Percent of population 25 and older whose highest degree attained is a Bachelor's degree.

name: Advanced Degree Holders (% of pop. age 25+)
description: Percent of population 25 and older whose highest degree attained is a Master's, professional school degree, or Doctorate.

name: Residential Segregation (Non-white/white)
description: Index of dissimilarity between white and non-white tract residents. Conceptually, dissimilarity measures the percentage of a group’s population that would have to change residence for each block to have the same percentage of that group as the tract overall. The index ranges from 0.0 (complete integration) to 1.0 (complete segregation).

name: Female Representation
description: Percentage of women in state legislature or city council or equivalent in jurisdiction.
source: State Legislature and City Council Rosters

name: Residential Isolation (Non-white/white)
description: The isolation index measures the extent to which non-white tract residents are exposed only to one another, and is computed as the non-white-weighted average of the non-white proportion in each area.

name: Linguistic isolation (% of households)
description: Households in which no one 14 and over speaks English only or speaks a language other than English at home and speaks English very well.

name: Alternative Transportation Usage (% of commuters)
description: Percentage of commuters taking public transit, biking, walking, or working remotely.

name: Disconnected Youth (% of 16-19 year olds)
description: Percentage of teens and young adults ages 16-19 who are neither working nor in school.

name: Free early childhood care (% of districts)
description: Percentage of Local Educational Agencies (LEA), or school districts, that provide early childhood services to children birth through age 2.

name: Harassment or Bullying Incidents in Schools (per 1,000 enrolled)
description: Number of reported bullying or harassment incidents on the basis of sex, race, or disability status in schools per 1,000 enrolled students.

name: Fatal Encounters with Law Enforcement (per 100,000 pop.)
description: Number of incidents involving fatal encounters with law enforcment per 100,000 persons.

name: Home Ownership (% of households)
description: Percentage of households that are owner-occupied.

name: Incarceration Rate (per 100,000 pop.)
description: Rate of incarceration in state prisons and county jails per 100,000 persons.

name: Voter Turnout (% of voting eligible pop.)
description: Total number of voters divided by voting eligible population in the 2018 Midterm Elections.
